text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceClinicalStatusSearchParameter

Parameter clinical-status:token

Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the clinical-status eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?clinical-status={codeable concept}

ResourceAllergyIntolerance
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesAllergyIntolerance
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: AllergyIntoleranceClinicalStatusSearchParameter
description: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the clinical-status eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?clinical-status={codeable concept}
